content:
in March Penn State student Amber Rupp received a grant from  Dots Downtown to repurpose old State College parking meters according to the State College Borough Parking Department PERIOD

With the grant Rupp seniormarketing in collaboration with the State College Borough Parking Department used old parking meters and turned them into art pieces and yearround coin donation collectors for THON PERIOD

Donations can also be made towards the meters and THON through ParkMobile the parking app used in the area PERIOD

Editors note Amber Rupp is a current representative of The Daily Collegians creative department PERIOD
